name: Inter FTP Transfer
short_description:
iftpt is a Java CLI application that allows one to transfer files from one FTP server to another without having to download the files to a computer and then uploading them again to the target server one by one.

NOTE: This project was created in time of desperation so it may not fulfill all your FTP needs. If that's the case, you are welcome to modify it or you can simply join the project and apply your fixes.
